title: 3D Viewer Configuration
description: Configuration for all capabilities of the 3D Viwer module.

baseStationLocationStream.description: The stream that specifies location metadata.

mapSize.description: A number that specifies the size of the map.

devices.description: A list of devices that are enabled for the 3D viewer.

deviceId.description: A unique Id for a device.

odometryStream.description: Name of the stream that provides odometry metadata.

deviceVisibility.description: Toggles whether this device is visible or not.
